io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline

Class RPGConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.RPGConfig

  • public final class RPGConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for storing configuration details about the game engine.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468

    • Field Detail

      • autoSpriteMapSize

        private static int autoSpriteMapSize
        The size used by sprite maps generated by TextureMap. This requires texture mapping to be enabled. This must be set before textures are initialised. This setting will not surpass the maximum texture size of the graphics card.
        See Also:
        TextureMap, TextureMap.addMappedTexture(String, java.awt.image.BufferedImage), TextureMap.addSpriteMapMapped(String, java.awt.image.BufferedImage, int, int), TextureMap.generateAllMaps(), TextureMap.genTextureMap(int, int), TextureMap.loadMappedTexture(String, java.net.URL), TextureMap.loadSpriteMapMapped(String, java.net.URL, int, int), mapped

      • wind

        private static boolean wind
        Determines if the wind effect will be used by the rendering engine. If set to false any information provided by the game engine about wind will be set to 0.
        See Also:
        WindTexture, WindEntityTexture, WorldState, Client

      • tileSize

        private static int tileSize
        The size used by tiles as the grid size.
        See Also:
        Tile, TileTexture, WorldState

      • keyInput

        private static KeyboardInputProvider keyInput
        A handler for storing bindings on keyboards. This defaults to a MapKeyProvider
        See Also:
        MapKeyProvider, InputUtils

      • mapped

        private static boolean mapped
        Determines if textures should be mapped/atlases. This must be set before textures are initialised.
        See Also:
        TextureMap, TextureMap.addMappedTexture(String, java.awt.image.BufferedImage), TextureMap.addSpriteMapMapped(String, java.awt.image.BufferedImage, int, int), TextureMap.generateAllMaps(), TextureMap.genTextureMap(int, int), TextureMap.loadMappedTexture(String, java.net.URL), TextureMap.loadSpriteMapMapped(String, java.net.URL, int, int), autoSpriteMapSize

    • Method Detail

      • getAutoSpriteMapSize

        public static int getAutoSpriteMapSize()
        Gets the size used by sprite maps generated by TextureMap. This requires texture mapping to be enabled. This setting will not surpass the maximum texture size of the graphics card but may display as a higher value. This must be set before textures are initialised.
        Returns:
        An int that is greater than 0.
        See Also:
        TextureMap, TextureMap.addMappedTexture(String, java.awt.image.BufferedImage), TextureMap.addSpriteMapMapped(String, java.awt.image.BufferedImage, int, int), TextureMap.generateAllMaps(), TextureMap.genTextureMap(int, int), TextureMap.loadMappedTexture(String, java.net.URL), TextureMap.loadSpriteMapMapped(String, java.net.URL, int, int), isMapped(), setMapped(boolean), setAutoSpriteMapSize(int)

      • setAutoSpriteMapSize

        public static void setAutoSpriteMapSize(int autoSpriteMapSize)
        Sets the size used by sprite maps generated by TextureMap. This requires texture mapping to be enabled. This setting will not surpass the maximum texture size of the graphics card but may display as a higher value. If a value greater than the maximum texture size is set it will change the setting but still be limited. This must be set before textures are initialised.
        See Also:
        TextureMap, TextureMap.addMappedTexture(String, java.awt.image.BufferedImage), TextureMap.addSpriteMapMapped(String, java.awt.image.BufferedImage, int, int), TextureMap.generateAllMaps(), TextureMap.genTextureMap(int, int), TextureMap.loadMappedTexture(String, java.net.URL), TextureMap.loadSpriteMapMapped(String, java.net.URL, int, int), isMapped(), setMapped(boolean), #getAutoSpriteMapSize(int)

      • isWind

        public static boolean isWind()
        Determines if the wind effect will be used by the rendering engine. If set to false any information provided by the game engine about wind will be set to 0.
        Returns:
        true if the wind effect is enabled. false otherwise.
        See Also:
        WindTexture, WindEntityTexture, WorldState, Client, setWind(boolean)

      • setWind

        public static void setWind(boolean wind)
        Determines if the wind effect will be used by the rendering engine. If set to false any information provided by the game engine about wind will be set to 0.
        Parameters:
        wind - true if the wind effect is enabled. false otherwise.
        See Also:
        WindTexture, WindEntityTexture, WorldState, Client, isWind()

      • getTileSize

        public static int getTileSize()
        The size used by tiles as the grid size.
        Returns:
        an int that is greater that 0.
        See Also:
        Tile, TileTexture, WorldState, setTileSize(int)

        The size used by tiles as the grid size.

        Returns:

        See Also:

      • setKeyInput

        public static void setKeyInput(KeyboardInputProvider keyInput)
        A handler for storing bindings on keyboards. This defaults to a MapKeyProvider
        Parameters:
        keyInput - A KeyboardInputProvider. This cannot be null.
        See Also:
        MapKeyProvider, InputUtils, getKeyInput()

      • isMapped

        public static boolean isMapped()
        Determines if textures should be mapped/atlases. This must be set before textures are initialised.
        Returns:
        true if mapping is enabled, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        TextureMap, TextureMap.addMappedTexture(String, java.awt.image.BufferedImage), TextureMap.addSpriteMapMapped(String, java.awt.image.BufferedImage, int, int), TextureMap.generateAllMaps(), TextureMap.genTextureMap(int, int), TextureMap.loadMappedTexture(String, java.net.URL), TextureMap.loadSpriteMapMapped(String, java.net.URL, int, int), setMapped(boolean), getAutoSpriteMapSize(), setAutoSpriteMapSize(int)

      • setMapped

        public static void setMapped(boolean mapped)
        Sets a variable determining if textures should be mapped/atlases. This must be set before textures are initialised.
        Parameters:
        mapped - true if mapping should be enabled, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        TextureMap, TextureMap.addMappedTexture(String, java.awt.image.BufferedImage), TextureMap.addSpriteMapMapped(String, java.awt.image.BufferedImage, int, int), TextureMap.generateAllMaps(), TextureMap.genTextureMap(int, int), TextureMap.loadMappedTexture(String, java.net.URL), TextureMap.loadSpriteMapMapped(String, java.net.URL, int, int), isMapped(), getAutoSpriteMapSize(), setAutoSpriteMapSize(int)

      • getLangProvider

        public static LangProvider getLangProvider()
        Determines how language settings are computed. This defaults to returning the current language. This must be set before languages are initialised.
        Returns:
        The current language provider.
        See Also:
        Lang, setLangProvider(LangProvider)

      • setLangProvider

        public static void setLangProvider(LangProvider lang)
        Determines how language settings are computed. This must be set before languages are initialised.
        Parameters:
        lang - The new language provider.
        See Also:
        Lang, #getLangProvider(LangProvider)

      • getLangloc

        public static java.lang.String[] getLangloc()
        Gets the location of language files for the game. This must be set before languages are initialised.
        Returns:
        An array of relative paths (to the language pack) of language files. These will usually resemble file names.
        See Also:
        Lang, LangPack

      • setLangloc

        public static void setLangloc(java.lang.String[] langloc)
        Sets the location of language files for the game. This must be set before languages are initialised.
        Parameters:
        An - array of relative paths (to the language pack) of language files. These will usually resemble file names. null will be interpreted as an empty array.
        See Also:
        Lang, LangPack

        See Also:

      • getFilterMode

        public static int getFilterMode()
        Determines the default filter mode for textures. This must be set before textures are initialised.
        Returns:
        FILTER_NEAREST if nearest filtering is used and FILTER_LINEAR if bilinear filtering is used.
        See Also:
        Image.setFilter(int), TextureMap

      • setFilterMode

        public static void setFilterMode(int filterMode)
        Sets the default filter mode for textures. This must be set before textures are initialised.
        Parameters:
        filterMode - FILTER_NEAREST if nearest filtering is used and FILTER_LINEAR if bilinear filtering is used.
        See Also:
        Image.setFilter(int), TextureMap

      • getPathfindingThreads

        public static int getPathfindingThreads()
        Gets the number of pathfinding threads to use.
        Returns:
        An int value in the range 0..Integer.MAX_VALUE. A value of 0 will disable pathfinding.

      • setPathfindingThreads

        public static void setPathfindingThreads(int pathfindingThreads)
        Gets the number of pathfinding threads to use.
        Parameters:
        pathfindingThreads - An int value in the range 0..Integer.MAX_VALUE. A value of 0 will disable pathfinding.
